DSraQel_SQMkU--hv8qPfg.text: Shane's is pretty decent BBQ for a chain. I always get the pulled pork plate; the meat is juicy, portions are generous, side dishes are ok, and the food is delivered quickly.  Really a three stars for the food, but I give it an extra star for going out of their way to identify what is gluten free. The information is greatly appreciated.

u7NpzDfC1r29l4NCMxDwkg.text: We have eatin at this place a few times, we went around 8 last night, the BBQ tasted like it was from the day before, it had BBQ sauce all over it, (think they were trying to cover the horrible flavor) some fries were hot others cold, hush puppies are the best thing this place has to offer! I will never go here again and waste $26!! I know we went at 8 and they close at 9, but u should always have hot food & food that taste fresh! Not day old!! No stars for this place!! Oops it makes me do a star, ugh!

tYm5xwwMQZHRLHUcM5GpCw.text: Wanted a quick bite of BBQ on our travels north. We were coming from Orlando and wanted some good grub to carry us back to PA. Shane's ended up being the perfect spot! It presents as a fast food restaurant but believe me, it is quality BBQ food. All 3 of us in our party got the sampler platter. It came with chicken or pork, ribs, chicken tenders, 2 sides, and a piece of toast. $10, can't beat it. I tried all 4 sauces placed on the table and they were great. Would definitely eat here again!

23sOC7G-hqGc4y2i4IC5VA.text: Food pretty good. Had sampler because it was my first visit. Grilled tenders the best. The sides are okay. Had Mac and cheese and friend okra. Ribs also very good. But they better be since its rib shack. Thing I was most impressed by was the service. I work customer service and it's hard to find good customer service now a days. Shelby was the girl at counter taking orders, running food, boxing up to go orders, cleaning up tables and still came by to check up on me and that everything was good. Hard to come by that now a days.

nr0gyHgTCvHyLMxv54l84Q.text: A great BBQ fix! With large portions of mouth-watering, fall-off-the-bone ribs, succulent pulled pork and side dishes that work oh so well, Shane's Rib Shack is one of the best BBQ places I've been to in quite some time. For a chain, it exceeded my expectations. Would definitely eat here again!

vHs7-eX5FgpAYKhFCiEqVQ.text: The food here is good. The only negative I have that I have to say is the baked beans. They tasted like a can of pintos opened up with chopped onion mixed in it. The pulled pork sandwich and the BBQ chicken sandwich was so good. Generous portions!

McFiLIG-3Q6GddpyBfzYVw.text: Amazingly great ribs and pork for a chain restaurant. Not to mention their delicious original bbq sauce. Easily better than some of the higher priced places with ribs with arguably better taste.

Fxg6CFVMbR4gMF5y5OZfQw.text: The family went last night after visiting North Lake Mall. You order at the counter and they bring you the food. Service was quick. Place was very busy.  I had the half-chicken plate and wife had the pulled pork plate. The plates come with two sides and garlic bread  Children had pork sandwich and chicken fingers. The chicken fingers can be ordered grilled which is healthier than fried  Everyone enjoyed their meals. Portions are good sized.  The BBQ sauces came in three varieties and were tasty. The sweet tea was also good.  Drinks are self-service.  The place was clean and staff was very friendly and helpful  I gave it four stars because the place was much better than average in all aspects and we will return when we are in the area.

6hH2rj8VNAD_6roLn1EBfA.text: If you are looking for beef ribs, not the place...but their wings are great & the cobbler is awesome. The service is friendly.

8IjQQoFMteyuxI6m67_nng.text: Pretty decent! Love the environment, awesome sweet tea, and it is far from pricey!!! Great outdoor seating area & free wifi!

p4--iQ1YfgujaRW7vIv1qA.text: It's a great place to go for casual BBQ which is rare to find. I took my dad n he's a BBQ critic he said it was ok which is a push for him. It's not right off of the smoker but if your craving BBQ it's a quick grab and go fix.

NfJ8K7GhGnYrjya8GiCBrw.text: Love the place. Close to work, so I go there for lunch. Wish they would open one in Mooresville. Never got anything bad......

MJodbBPQmTNdnbTBjAyzMg.text: The food is good but the service is mediocre at best. You tend to have to wait quite a bit of time in order to place your order. Meanwhile there is a camera placed looking at the registers but no one is looking at how many people are waiting in line. I listened to one of the employees telling a Customer that a plate did not contain have a half pound of meat... It had 8oz on it. That should tell you all you need to know about the waitstaff. But as stated earlier the food is pretty good. The sauce selection is nice. And when the servers are doing their jobs it is served really quick.

W74uYE04lkbhIqU6x1U61Q.text: We (party of 10 adults and 4 children)went to Shane's @ Northlake for the first time last night for my hubby's birthday and we were pleasantly surprised. Not only was the food great, but the service was exceptional! The 2 men that serviced us provided the best customer service and made sure that our visit was an enjoyable one. We will definitely return because we were so pleased. Tip...please take cash for tips as their register doesn't give you the option to leave a tip on your card.

iWsU1vZ5CIia_wjP5A2ffw.text: My to go order included ribs with baked beans and mac and cheese.  The ribs were meaty but lacked succulence. One of the slabs was darker (burnt) than it should have been.  The baked beans were right up my alley.  The kind of mac and cheese served is made with velveeta; not my cup of tea.  To their credit, I can proudly say the peach cobbler was some of the best I have ever had!  It was scrumptious.  I ordered a large so that we could share, but the portion was really only enough for one person, to my dismay.  Yum.  Now, I know where to go when I want something sweet.

nK9qSwLaBvmXJ2NYTzdcPA.text: We got a full rack of ribs plate with fries and mac n cheese with two water cups for $22. The ribs were delicious! And the Texas toast was great too! They brought us an extra plate for the bones which was really nice, too. The ribs were tender and the sauce was really great. This restaurant is about half and half a to-go and dine-in kind of place. A fast-food restaurant!

KB2QuJjxkAFNVhICrVPADQ.text: Don't waste your time. They wasted my time. I waited for 30 minutes for a to go order of half of rack of ribs and sweet potato fries. They took my money and never put my order in. The manager was nice enough to apologize and refund my money. Yeah thanks

WNalONzQ1nt3Q6u426Yu_g.text: This is my favorite place to eat because the service and food are so great. I went in for a sampler tonight and was happy to see it on special. I was disappointed to be charged regular price, that was rectified quickly. I had to ask for my drink cup after waiting another few minutes. Got my order fairly quickly, and drove home. I was ready to dive into my food and was really sad to find the half rack of ribs were missing!!!! Not my typical experience, and since there were so many missteps I had to say something. I will give them another try.

aZZmYMS6Ww9Zk0_So7YC1A.text: Food was ok. My ribs certainly did not fall off the bone. Actually they needed to cook longer. Service was great, waitresses are nice. Not for sure if I would return had way better barbecue than this

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Half rib plate

BEf2L0xlXsDn2TTePJVwwg.text: loved the food especially the peach cobbler. Order the sampler its enough food for two people. Will be back again.

WUK7CjNgawbbC5uzNtw1yA.text: I really like Shanes. I especially love their smoked wings finished off on the grill. We had a coupon. Two 1/2 racks of ribs 1 lb of pork/chicken BBQ. We chose chicken, 4 lrg sides, 4 toast  and gallon of tea, $30. Price is not bad at all for what you get. My issue was with BBQ chicken. All they did was cut up their boneless chicken breast and pour a TON of BBQ sauce over it. It did not mimic the pulled pork at all. It was not nasty, but I guess I expected something different. It was flavorless other than the sauce it was drenched in. They could of at least threw the meat on the grill to give it the smoke flavor. If you eat pork and you're thinking of trying the pulled/chopped chicken....DONT! I will go back, I just won't ever venture out from the norm.

y0eyAHWVm0W7TJyKJzX1rQ.text: Stopped by to check out some BBQ and was not disappointed! Got the sampler n 2 two meat plate with pork ribs n BBQ chx. Awesome flavor and not over done w seasonings.. I like that the customer service was prompt, helpful, and very courteous! I was in and out after placing an order to go.. This place definitely has my stamp of approval and I "came up" on NC style cue'. Kudos to the chefs and the service.. I'd recommend anyone curious to Get there and get U some!!

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sorry that&#39;s all that&#39;s left!!

RfilFCuvBIPIyWHS6-rV7w.text: I'm happy to be the 1st to review this location.  Very good ribs!  The ribs are meaty and fall right off the bone. Their pork bbq is served with vinegar based sauce if you like that style.  They also have a great selection of sides, try the fried okra, it is excellent!

WK6h4WoyXbkWRUBrlfBy9w.text: I love BBQ and this place didn't disappoint for a quick pork stop. A friend suggested it and having never heard of the place I wasn't sure what to expect. The service was great, the food was awesome and for the lunch rush, I didn't really have to wait long for my food. I'm really glad to know I have a great BBQ place close by - I had been driving across town!

4yPtozh8piJcBrDQVPhdnQ.text: Good BBQ - I had the chicken.  Choices for sauce on the side.  Yummy sweet potato fries.  Service was pretty quick.  Nothing to complain about.

JzNy5jKsetLs9-suXIioZA.text: Shane's is a chain BBQ joint that serves about what you would expect from a chain.  Consistently OK food.  Pluses for the food include, pork that is a good mix of inside moist pork and the outside crunchy bark.  The ribs are fall off the bone tender and have a mildly smokey flavor.  On the minus side is that the pork has very little smoke on it and the consistency makes it seem like it is kept in a steam table as it's a little on the soggy side.  Three of the sauces, regular, hot, spicy, taste about the same and I can't really figure the difference between the hot and the spicy.  All have an overwhelming chili powder taste.  The mustard sauce is a bit on the sweet side for my tastes but not bad overall.    The service at this location is pretty fast and definitely friendly.  At the end of the day, Shane's is a once a year kind of place for me as it takes about that long to forget that it's just ok and not really worth the effort.

vYXtBlFRXBrbMub-gX3JRA.text: We stopped in for a quick bite before a late movie and Shane's was packed!  This was around 8pm on a Saturday.  A couple things impressed me after noticing how busy they were: Always had ice available for drinks. Always had fresh brewed tea available. Bathrooms stayed clean (went in before and after meal). Order names were called loud enough to be heard above the crowd, yet not be annoying. Food orders were processed in a timely manner considering the size of the dine-in and carry out Customers.  And with all this happening, we still had a Food Runner and a Manager stop by just to ask if everything was good during our visit.  Way to go Shane's!!

vqI8T5f3ol18eZgh6ZjyxQ.text: I ordered the lemon pepper and teriyaki wings. The lemon pepper wings were very dry. They tasted like they were recorded then doused with the seasoning. The teriyaki wings were fresher  and not so dry.

Ksgvo_tBWMxoJmFn9Wh3-g.text: My family and I used to enjoy coming here for a fast, hot and simple dinner solution.  On our last two visits, the food was lukewarm at best, not as flavorful and sloppily presented.  Another thing at this location is there always seem to be a lack of managerial presence when we're here. Lots of 20/younger somethings  trying to run the show. We may check out some of the other locations when we happen to be in their neck of the woods.

a3fKVcxlNo_dxcu5pAOGeg.text: The food is great but service meh. I always order to go and I literally had to wait 25 minutes for a chicken sandwich and baked beans while others came and went with their food and it wasn't busy.

4Bk1uBk43qliUFaAqvgPsw.text: Awesome Bbq thought it would be a chain same ole same ole as its in a strip mall BUT not at all this is the real BBQ deal

srPp0CLTO0E61MwnXAkK0A.text: Normally, I love going to Shane's.  For some reason, though, they have changed their fries to substandard potatoes.  Bring back the triangular cross-section fries!  Also, the brownies have been downgraded.  BBQ is still great, though.

3VPjX483Onv-uxlNYZJFww.text: Just had a quick lunch at this location near NorthLake Mall.  You know for a chain BBQ jiont, it is great.  Actually, chain or not it rivals many here in Charlotte.    I had the combo sampler platter with pork, ribs and chicken tenders,  I admit tenders are an odd item for a BBQ place perhaps.  But these are the biggest tenders I have seen.  A choice of sauces or grilled if you prefer.  Very good.  The pork was juicy and tender, the ribs fork tender and full of flavor.  But the ribs seemed to be more steamed or something like that rather than cooked low and slow on a smoker.  Sides were good too.  VERY cheesey M&C.  Yum.  The platter was pretty big too.  Maybe too big for lunch. I'm stuffed.  In and out in 30 minutes with friendly service.    Sure you could find better BBQ joints but this one won't be a bad one any time.

hM3XLRu1jBrABefJlwkgZg.text: Very nice set up inside for a chain, and the staff was very knowledgable when it came time to order.  I ordered the 2 meat combo, pulled pork and ribs.  It came with 2 sides so I got the fried Okra and Mac n cheese. The pulled pork was very tasty and super moist.  The ribs were fall off the bone delicious cant believe I finished both because the portions were huge! Fried Okra was fresh with the perfect balance of seasoning crunch on outside and soft on the inside.  Mac was good and cheesy! I am giving it 5 stars because the food and  staff.  Staff picked up my bone dry plate and cleared the table for me.  I will definitely return for more!

e-722EdTD0Zq4N6dtHq1Zw.text: This is my favorite go to for "cookout style" food. Everything I've had here is great! My favorite is the fried okra. They have awesome customer service and I look forward to my next visit!

UmfKMB_hXvoq7b9iboHljA.text: Great family restaurant and good food. I ordered the ribs, sweet potato fries, and the "famous" peach cobbler they offer. The meat was tender and I love the variety of sauces they offered. The cobbler was ok - nothing special (certainly nothing that blows you away). This place is great for a good bbq fixing.

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States

YAbaxsis_2tqvnvSTfmeIA.text: Best BBQ place ever and the Peach Tea is the bomb!!!!! I would recommend this place to anybody!!! I definitely will be back and I can't forget the customer service is AWESOME!!!

IKReP-0j4aZhyLxs_YLw8Q.text: I always get the traditional wings and they are always hot and fresh when delivered. The food has always been good and the wings are a good size. The service has been good when I go.

zG_-JJlCqaR6Zh835zPZxQ.text: Good lunch option in the Northlake area. Their bbq is above average but the French fries are just OK.

IiOLaGiYFqBr92FhizyuKg.text: The wonderful smell of delicious bbq hits you as soon as you step into this Northlake restaurant. It is clean and spacious and the staff is attentive and friendly. My coworker and I both had delicious chicken tenders which were also quite filling. I ordered three but two was sufficient. After our tasty lunch, we got in the parking lot and the car wouldn't start. At the same moment an employee from the restaurant was dumping the trash. Mike, the owner came to our rescue. He heard the car "trying" to turn over and asked us if we need help. Yes!!!! So needless to say we will be faithful customers.

Tk0VCoiUxFrlA-knkNrFOA.text: This place is awesome!!  We shared a sampler plate because the portions are so big...  everything on the menu is perfectly smoked to the right taste.. the sauces are True to the Carolinas...and the peach cobbler is the best in the business..!!   I don't care if you have to run over your own dog to get here.. eat here now..!

75S62eA5v-nougwzyEbDug.text: Great customer service. Food is always on point and you get really large portions. Get the smothered pork sandwich!!

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Big selection.

1Bx69qi_OmzrkDiW4L0-5A.text: Tonight November 3 I had one of the worst experiences that I have ever had at any establishment. I live down the street so I wanted to call my order in around 915 and a lady answered and put me on hold which was fine initially. I was on hold so long I decided to go ahead and get ready to head to the restaurant I had time to get dressed get in my car and drive all the way there still on hold. I walked in and three girls were standing at all three cash registers talking to each other,  I proceeded to let them know that I had been on hold for 20 minutes at that point I received no apologies in a very smart tone one asked if I was ready to order. I couldn't believe how nonchalant and unapologetic all three of these women were! Worst experience ever, I do not plan on ever going back. There are only a few restaurants that are good enough to deal with bad service and Shane's is not one.

a-rLnSfkq5t-eKhfmOoQwQ.text: A-Ok hits the nail on the head.  Food was acceptable but nothing near as good as some of the other bbq places I've tried in Charlotte.  Ribs were decent.  Just a hint of smokiness and the kind of preparation that you have to chew off the bone.  They came pre-sauced and there was really no evidence of rub.  Okra was right out of the freezer so nothing special there either.  I suppose this is what you get when you pick a bbq place that's basically located at the mall.  Live & learn...

PskjGcQI7fU3xnLvJOahpw.text: Good American food. First time visit and I got the sampler because I didn't know what I should get. You start off by ordering up at the front. The sampler included a small portion of baby back ribs in their sauce. A choice of bbq pork or chicken. Two sides with many options to choose from and two tenders that you can customize with sauces. Not bad for a $16 meal with a drink and the variety that the sampler provides.   Clean and good service. Recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. The sampler

S-EEIpdGUClZIA4xpQbt9g.text: I really enjoyed Shane's on my first visit while in town for work this week.  I had the two meat plate-great pulled pork-actually cooked but still juicy (I don't use the "m" word to describe food...that ruins it!) and the smoked wings (non-breaded) were tasty as well.   I had medium buffalo sauce on these and would recommend it.  Sides were good-co-workers with me liked the baked beans and fries, I liked the mac and cheese-very gooey!  A very relaxed place that takes a little effort to get to from the main road but is a good lunch spot that I'll visit when/if in this part of town again.

8oI49hKt13kJ4YN-fWHYKQ.text: My favorite BBQ restaurant was closed when we flew in on Sunday, so we asked a few.locals who recommended Shane's. I'm glad we stopped here because the ribs were delicious. The coleslaw and fried okra were good as well. The service made the experience a memorable one. We'll definitely stop again some time.

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States

TCMGtSVujGtfPMJ4NfZ7kA.text: It's ok. Pulled pork was above average but beans and slaw were bland. Ribs were average.

CzES1dfaUgHIl5hWrzZMQg.text: My girlfriend and I ate once here and it was several months ago.  It was a memorable experience because the food was good and I liked the Texas Toast and sides.  For some reason it took about 30 minutes to get our food, despite a few other parties after* us getting their food well before we did.  No big deal, we sat and talked and the dinner ended up being with it.  We came to this facility because some other people had mentioned it was good.  I'm not into ribs or wings at all, but I found the bar-b-que to be satisfactory.  I will go back here again, but there are a ton of food options in this area so it makes it difficult to frequent any spot that is not superb.

nTus1_bkLWsnG6G7Go_7Zw.text: Shout out to the Shanes I visited today! I ordered a few items to go for the office and had the best customer service! For the amount of orders placed, they were very quick with getting everything done, asked me if I wanted any additional sauces, AND they even walked me out to my car as I had drinks and quite a few plates. I received the best customer service! Everyone at the office was very pleased with the food too. Overall, fast, delicious, and so helpful. I'll definitely recommend to my friends. The value is amazing!

THRjurGZUFV40XOOSl3YkQ.text: Ate here for the first time last week. Overall, I would eat here again but only get the pulled pork.   I went with the. Sampler platter with ribs, pulled pork, and chicken tenders. The ribs were great and not overly sauced and the pulled pork was the best I've ever had. The chicken tenders were a no go for me.   The service was very good overall.

yDaWEebzS9KCYY0UEUIy5A.text: Employees were awesome. Unfortunately the food not so much. This is North Carolina, if you want to have a BBQ place better make sure you know how to cook it.  The beans were ok. Everything else is raccoon food.

YPDM4M_VAbH_z2P0Ebbq9A.text: I would say this place is like the McDonald's of BBQ, but that is not fair to McDonalds. This is a counter service, please don't ask the staff for anything (even silverware), kind of joint. I had a half a rack of ribs that was dry and tough, mac and cheese that was greasy, not creamy, and flavorless green beans. The only plus was that the food was hot. I feel like this chain restaurant doesn't care about the quality of their food, they just want to dish out something to make a buck. I don't feel like I got a bad experience, I think this is just what this place has to offer, so take it or leave it; as for me, I'll leave it.

Sjm4n9wPq9tt80KzOmgbeA.text: Excellent for fast food BBQ their ribs are reallllly good. Reason why I give it 4 stars is because their sides weren't alll that great, the mac and cheese tasted like KFC.. potato salad was okay. I enjoyed the quality in customer service here, Thank You Shane's!

QgDMaRIE5ZNk7Wfm9k-CTw.text: Good old fashioned Carolina barbecue! Excellent service, tasty food , fries are awesome.  Large selection of bbq sauce. Fair prices! Great location!

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Pulled pork barbecue with fries and coleslaw.

PxXI9vQL7IlEYPupQ392AA.text: Stopped in to pick up some bottles of my son's favorite bbq sauce to take home to CA.  Cam was so helpful and friendly!  He cares about his job and it shows.  Thanks, Cam!

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Pulled Pork Plate with Cole Slaw and French Fries
Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. BBQ Chicken Salad
Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Shack Salad with Pork only $6 today!

XmeGqpobw3XOeMuFfpD3Jg.text: So I was introduced to Shane's by a coworker who invited me to the newer location at the premier outlets. Still the one at Northlake is on the way home from work and closer to my house.  I have been to this location about 5 times but of those visits I had two not so great experiences.  1) the day the power went out - the ribs were super tuff (maybe just close the next time) 2) a soggy sandwich that was hardly edible (solution - skip the sandwiches). Hang in there this ends well - I continue to go to this location over driving just 5 or so minutes further because MOST (not all but most) of the employees here are super customer service centric.  People don't realize how far customer service with a sincere smile can get you.  The service among most here is 5 star for my money.

tAvniBe08aT6kSfU-gP5cw.text: I rarely review chain restaurants but I feel this one needs a review.  While the look of the menu lends itself to a "cheesy fake bbq place" I have to say that for the casual bbq person, this food is delicious and continues to be fresh!  I am not huge on a Smokey flavor and I enjoy the pulled pork as well as the chicken fingers, baked beans, mac n cheese and hushpuppies.  I used this Shane's location to cater a 70 person lunch for my office a few months back and that is what turned me on to the food! The catering came on time with everything we could possibly need for a bbq lunch.  The price is extremely reasonable for catering also!

OOemKiDf0_mRzklINsybFg.text: Don't come here for wine and filet mignon, it's a rib shack! Fall off the bone, finger licking good ribs. That's pork ribs for those people that don't understand that ribs come from pigs - we are in the South! There are 11 side items that you can choose from, and peach cobbler. Need I say anymore! They've got the best "butts" in town (it says so on their shirts;-). Seriously, it's a great place to eat and have some fun.

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Counter area

W4GxI6hlb-fz7aPEaeA_Qw.text: Healthy and tasty l BBQ sandwich and Brunswick stew. I ate the sandwich as an open-faced sandwich.

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. BBQ chicken sandwich with Brunswick stew
Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Specials menu

-rb528KyeiVi8dkDf61zTQ.text: The customer service was awesome and the food was delicious cant wait to come back to your State!!!

bMouADiNYzn1qgGpK5ItTw.text: Really nice place. Quick and friendly service. Good food.i highly recommend the smoked wings. As good or better than any wings I've had in Charlotte. Crispy but still super moist. Ribs were good. Had a nice char on the outside, finished on the grill. Clean restaurant.

aYphInIba9kmJf3gBN3iiA.text: I had the BBQ pork sandwich today.  I got coleslaw on it, and it came with a side of bbq sauce to pour on it.  It was very good, and it was a good portion too.  The only thing I would change is how the meat is put on the bun.  I hate biting into big clumps of meat.  In the middle of me eating, I had to stop and open my sandwich and pull the big clumps of meat apart and spread it evenly.  Other than that the sandwich was very good, and I will be ordering it again.  thank you

iV3IyifC6v4k6pHtcJTAXQ.text: Dry dry and dry. Threw the ribs away after 1 bite. Chicken was dry. Mac n cheese was nothing special. Wings were bland and dry. Just couldn't eat anything

LLuYlLs5XE5a43H0xV1oBw.text: Great traditional smoked wings. I had them with hot sauce and a side salad. Very Smokey and the meat fell off the bone.

2U8p4kd-uL0P4683ykxCxQ.text: Oh Shane's how I have missed you!   I used to live in walking distance of the Afton Ridge Shopping center and when the Shane's Rib Shack location opened up there a over a year ago it instantly became a favorite in our household. Not living as closely now I haven't been as frequent a visitor and driving by last week I was extremely disappointed to find out that they have closed recently. Not really sure why as they were always busy (and had decent Yelp reviews!) but I had not given up. A quick Yelp search showed two locations still alive and kicking and I needed to get my fix.   This location is directly across the street from Northlake Mall, luckily not far away. The inside is what I've come to expect, clean yet sort of rustic black and white motif. I ordered the 1lb chopped barbeque chicken (I was rather hungry) and a drink and sat down. Food came out quick enough and I finally got to feast. The chicken is as delicious as I remember. Moist, tangy, just enough spice. There are sauces on the table for you to have your pick of flavors but I personally don't find it necessary on the chicken, it's wonderful as is. There are so many wonderful restaraunts with all sorts of barbeque dishes so it's really hard to pick a "best," but if your speaking strictly chicken, this is near the top of my list. I didn't get a side, but my dish did come with four pieces of Shane's secret weapon, their delicious Texas Toast! That bread is truly wonderful. Soft and light. I know it's just buttered bread, but it's damn near perfect buttered bread. A little tip, some of there sandwiches (like the "Big Dad" pulled pork) come on the Texas Toast and some come on a plain bun, but they will always sub out the normal bun for toast if you ask. It can only make your experience better.   This place does not disappoint and I plan to visit again soon.

sWVTFIsK0pe7cZLG2lzHRQ.text: I just had a great meal at Shane's Rib Shack! The Brunswick stew is out of this world delicious! The pulled pork and the ribs are also delicious. The chicken tenders are also great! It's a great place to eat! I highly recommend this restaurant.

MaGboSBGXxmIrY-0BTNEKg.text: The was not the best BBQ place. The food taste as if it was processed especially the peach cobbler. I ordered the Shane's sampler the ribs was really good! The chicken strips had No seasoning....brunswick stew and fried okra as sides was never informed that there was no okra I was just given fries instead

photos.caption: Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Peach Cobbler and Brownie
Photo of Shane's Rib Shack - Charlotte, NC, United States. Shane&#39;s Sampler

Sfrh0p_xtRsyPyNX0zqRlw.text: Ok I'm giving 4 stars only because I feel like each time we've ate there the employees act like customers just get on their nerves. Just not friend at all! Other than that, the food is amazing & the peach tea is our favorite tea ever:) You definitely can't go wrong with the sampler!!!

OMEcDe2qZFtE9sTJe7YGrg.text: As a frequent customer of this location, I am always impressed with their friendly and timely service.  My father is difficult to please, and he loves the food and service as well -- especially the peach cobbler!  Good food and good people!

ERqVoRXnO_6_ponLLzJ22A.text: Absolutely the best ribs and fried okra I've had in a while! That Mac and cheese is awesome... our waiter DJ was excellent and courteous. Can't wait till next time!!

80d-oUBHs7ARPEARwny_4A.text: OMG. First time here. The customer service was impeccable. They took the tine out to explain the menu along with allowing me to sample the Brunswick stew. I ordered the ribs plate.  Lets just say they were finger licking good. I will be back to try to BBQ.. Thanks for the quality food and customer service.

799__IesgR-r75zX3IbbCg.text: This is one of the most memorable experiences I ever had at a restaurant! When I first walked in me and my friend was greeted with a smile and a welcome from Jay. I felt welcomed and like part of the family.  The cashier/Jay took the time to explain what our coupon meant and other options to expand on our order! Not to mention it was Father's Day so the place was packed out, he didn't try to rush us or anything and he was multitasking and helping another cashier! Now the extraordinary part is my car broke down in front of there establishment and Jay offered to help he also went as far as saying he would see if his manager would let him take me to a repair shop if I couldn't get a ride!! Who does that in this day & age!!  This man went well over above and beyond for his customers!  Which made my day go a little better considering I was stuck smh. He deserves a promotion...he's an invaluable employee,  because customer service like that is non-existent.

7adtMmUTvrTTECEz_b54XA.text: This place is an average chain BBQ place. The location is very convenient and there were a lot of parking even during lunch hour. I had a pulled pork salad and the taste was OK. Having said that, I would recommend another BBQ place about 10 min away called Lancasters.
